ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"ETA-7"), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"ETA-4"), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"ETA"), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"Telex Confirmation"), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"Customs Clearance"), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c,"Final Delivery") ), ISBLANK( AMS__c ) )
